## hpr1999 :: How I record a full band under Linux

 How I use Ardour, Jack audio, and a Presonus interface to record an entire band practice under linux.

Tools:

Ardour
Calf studio gear
Invada Plugins
ArtyFX
Jack
Qjackctl

Hardware

Dell Latitude e6320
Presonus studiolive 16.4.2
various Microphones
